name: Black Hole Incident
description:
BLACK HOLE INCIDENT

Game done for brackeys game jam 2020.1

Do you have a smaller version of the earth in your house? Well weather you have or not, it doesn't change the one's astrophysicist mind who wants to have his own BLACK HOLE in his lab. Did he manage to tame it? Well..... no....... not really......

Controls: A/D - left/right, W/S - up/down, ESC - Pause, E-use

This game was made by two people. (https://twitter.com/AlexTuh1,  https://twitter.com/DbVectra)
